FuncDef: This command is used to specify route policies that control how routes are exported from the local VRF to other VRFs on the same or remote PE routers (via MP-BGP). Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
specifies the route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
